title: 'We own our land': Greenland's indigenous people slam Trump, say Arctic Island not for sale
summary_full: Greenland's Inuit, who collectively own their land, express bewilderment at geopolitical interest in buying the island.  Their traditional view sees them as guardians, not owners, of the land that predates and will outlast them. This principle is being challenged as international attention on Greenland intensifies.
